languages.text: "Не забывайся, обращаясь ко мне по имени".
"You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."
languages.original_text: "Не забывайся, обращаясь ко мне по имени".

traits.locale_text: "You forget yourself by addressing me by my name."
"You forget yourself by addressing me by my name."
"Don't be cocky referring to me on a first-name basis."
"Don't be cocky referring to me on a first-name basis."
"You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."
"You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."

languages.text: 「自由開拓者をファーストネームで呼ぶなどという無礼は働かないでくれよ」
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者をファーストネームで呼ぶなどという無礼は働かないでくれよ」

languages.text: “你竟敢对行商浪人直呼其名，你真是有点忘乎所以了。”
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."

traits.locale_text: “不要自以为是地直呼我的名字。”

languages.text: «Olvida su posición al llamar a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente por su nombre de pila».
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."

traits.locale_text: «No se crea que tiene derecho a llamarme por mi nombre».

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euch selbst vergessen, als Ihr {mf|den Freihändler mit seinem|die Freihändlerin mit ihrem} Vornamen angesprochen habt."
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."

traits.locale_text: "Werdet mal nicht übermütig, mich beim Vornamen anzusprechen."

languages.text: « De quel droit vous adressez-vous {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} par son prénom ? »
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."

traits.locale_text: « De quel droit vous adressez-vous {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} par son prénom ? »

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'e adıyla hitap edecek cüreti nereden buldun?"
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself by addressing the Rogue Trader by {mf|his|her} first name."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'e adıyla hitap edecek cüreti nereden buldun?"
